alert.note: Alert for Atkinson; Coffee; Northern Ware (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 3:55PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Coffee, east central Atkinson and northwestern Ware Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 355 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout 7 miles south of Nicholls, or 12 miles southwest of Alma, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dixie Union and Bickley. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
